abstract: Jon Pareles reviews concert of Islamic music performed by Qawal Najmuddin Saifuddin & Brothers and Hassan Hakmoun and Friends at Metropolitan Museum of Art's Grace Rainey Rogers Auditorium.
snippet: Ecstatic trance music from Pakistan and Morocco came to the Met on Saturday night with Qawal Najmuddin Saifuddin & Brothers and Hassan Hakmoun and Friends, to mark the opening of Islamic galleries.
lead_paragraph: Ecstatic trance music from Pakistan and Morocco came to the Met on Saturday night with Qawal Najmuddin Saifuddin & Brothers and Hassan Hakmoun and Friends, to mark the opening of Islamic galleries.

headline.main: Tides of Trance Meld Divine Echoes of South Asia and Africa
headline.print_headline: Tides of Trance Meld Divine Echoes of South Asia and Africa
headline.seo: Qawal Najmuddin Saifuddin & Brothers at Met Museum - Review
